title: Hyperion Looking for Top D3+ to qualify for ESL Meisterschaft
body:
Hello,

We are looking for a Top Laner to create a team to qualify for the ESL Meisterschaft. You will need to be from Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Liechtenstein and Luxembourg. Be 16 yrs+ and be D3+ in SoloQ.

If you are interested in having a tryout, please either add me in game or post on the thread below.

Thanks,
IGN: The FreudianSlip
